How to Add a Blog Post

  1. Create a JSON file in the appropriate category folder
  2. Use Claude Code to convert your markdown to HTML
  3. Store images in /public/blog/your-post-slug/

Reference images like: <img src="/blog/your-post-slug/image.png" />
